titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States respecting the right to decent, safe, sanitary, and affordable housing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary:
2/13/2007--Introduced.
Constitutional Amendment - States that all U.S. citizens shall have a right to decent, safe, sanitary, and affordable housing.
